name: Aquar  (Mon Calamari)
content:
Aquar was a Mon Calamari male that was affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. He was a capable commander and was skilled in starship repair, dodging, and the use of blasters and starship shielding. Aquar was also culturally knowledgeable and stood two meters tall. He wore a tunic over a shirt with pants, shoes and a helmet. He carried a blaster, a grenade, a medpac, and a comlink.
Aquar was created for the Rebel Characters Adventure Set, a boxed set of metal miniatures released in 1989 by West End Games to be used with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Aquar's character type was given as just "Mon Calamari" and his model came unpainted.
